name: Osprey Siskin 8 Pack - Unisex
description: Enough space for the essentials to hit the trails. It includes a Hydraulics LT 2.5L hydration reservoir that rides in its own dedicated compartment to make refills a snap and protect your gear from accidental spills. Attachments for a standard or full-face helmet and a ventilated Airscape™ suspension keep you cool on the climbs. And if things go wrong, the interior has tool organizer slots.Foam back panel channels airflow while keeping the load close to your body for stability.Shoulder straps and back panel have breathable mesh overlay and soft edges.Removable webbing waistbelt.Deep zippered opening gives you easy access.Front shove-it pocket lets you stash extra layers.Internal pocket has a scratch-free lining to protect sunnies or electronics.Dedicated hydration compartment with quick-connect attachment for easy filling.Magnetic clip keeps the bite valve tethered.Low-profile helmet carry with straps for full-face helmets.Loop for a blinky light.
